SELECT a.cycle,SUM(b.count) count FROM (
SELECT DATE_FORMAT(DATE_SUB(CURDATE(), INTERVAL ${item} MONTH),#{format}) AS cycle UNION
SELECT DATE_FORMAT(CURDATE(),#{format}) AS cycle
) a LEFT JOIN (select count,cycle from cost where charge_name=#{charge}) b on a.cycle=DATE_FORMAT(b.cycle,#{format}) GROUP BY a.cycle
